title: Angular Nation
description: Have you seen Qwik in action yet? If not, here's your chance! We've invited the Father of Qwik, aka the Father of Angular, Misko Hevery himself to show us what he built. As a HUGE bonus, we also invited one of our favorite teachers, Shai Reznik of HiRez.io fame. Sit back, buckle up, and prepare for a wild ride into the future of VERY FAST web pages!.
